resources.string: Values can explain our behavior and attitudes. One of the reasons why we may be satisfied with one employer but feel uncomfortable with another employer could be hidden within our values. Understanding our own values and reflecting on employer’s values may help navigate career development. We built Values Visualizer to help you comprehend your personal values, discover your [current or prospective] employer’s values, and compare both results on a chart.
We are using the Schwartz Theory of Basic Human Values. It outlines values which are believed to be universal across cultures. The provided survey is an adapted version of the Schwartz Value Survey.
You must answer all 46 survey questions in order to view the results of that survey. You can save your progress and return to complete the survey later.
Brought to you by Career Changeover
As a guiding principle in my life, this value is...
As a business guiding principle for the company, this value is...

The information provided in this application is for educational and entertainment purposes only. The survey results are not intended to diagnose any disease or conditions, and may not be used by health care professionals to recommend a treatment.
